name: Chaos Delivery
description:
Live out your dream of delivering newspapers in the suburbs! Pedal down an endless street on your bike dodging cars and dogs.

------------------------------- CONTROLS  ------------------------------------

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Mouse to aim, Left Click to throw newspaper

--------------------------------          TIPS           ------------------------------------

Cause chaos for extra points (hitting dogs and cars), but make sure to not miss - you lose points for each newspaper you throw! Also, hitting dogs will make them stop chasing you (don't worry, they are alive).
